data.title: The Sustainability Yearbook

data.text:
The Sustainability Yearbook - 2023 Rankings

The Sustainability Yearbook 2023 considered over 7,800 companies assessed in the 2022 Corporate Sustainability Assessment (CSA). This page provides the ranking of the 712 companies selected for this yearâ€™s Yearbook based on their S&P Global ESG Scores calculated from the CSA. Learn more about the Yearbook Methodology

The Sustainability Yearbook 2024 will launch on February 7, 2024.
